topics.body:
"According to screenwriter Buzz Dixon, Optimus Prime was to have a cameo in My Little Pony: The Movie. He was to be asked by one of the Ponies for aid against their antagonist, only to disappoint them for some reason, leaving the Pony no recourse but to try and enlist the aid of a drunken Shipwreck from G.I. Joe (no, really). Prime's (and Shipwreck's) scene was cut from the script at Hasbro's behest.":tfwiki.net/wiki/Optimus_Prime_(G1)/Generation_1_cartoon_continuity#Notes
:I
topics.author: 500b587e7f123b1f230014a9
